p: Viral release was also measured by TCID 50 assay. The TCID 50 data generated was generally confirmatory of the qRT-PCR data; however, we found the TCID 50 assay had inherently more variability ( Figure 2B). When compared to the transfected control we found both DG-d1 and DG-d2 reduced the TCID 50 titres ( P = 0.118, P = 0.054, respectively). The TCID 50 broadly data supports the qRT-PCR data; however not to the same level of confidence.
